title: Directors & Officers (D&O) liability policies
dataVerified: Company name, directors/officers, coverage limits, exclusions, retroactive date
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Policy status (active/cancelled). Link to insurer system (shareholders and authorized parties, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake D&O policies (securities fraud, shareholder disputes). Domain binding verifies insurer. Very long claims tail. High-value coverage ($10M-$100M+ typical). IPO/M&A verification.
